scripts.all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run format && pnpm run check && pnpm run build && pnpm run test  && pnpm run deploy:anvil
scripts.deploy:testnet: ACCOUNT=testnet-deployer pnpm deploy:deploy --verify && pnpm run deploy:validate
scripts.deploy:mainnet: ACCOUNT=mainnet-deployer pnpm deploy:deploy --verify && pnpm run deploy:validate
